hero.title: Restaurant Discovery Platform
hero.subtitle: Real experiences from real people. Follow other users, discover new restaurants and share your favorite places. Earn rewards and have fun while exploring.

features.title: Why do you need Dinver?
features.subtitle: Because it enables you to find your next favorite restaurant in a simple and fun way.

community.title: Connect with others
community.description: Follow friends and discover new restaurants through their visits and recommendations.

experiences.title: Feed with user experiences
experiences.description: Scroll through authentic user experiences at different restaurants and save restaurants that you would like to visit.

rewards.title: Earn rewards
rewards.description: Visit a restaurant, scan your receipt to log your visit and compete on the leaderboard based on points. Users with the most points win prizes every two weeks.

lists.title: Visited & Must visit
lists.description: A comprehensive list of all restaurants you've been to and the ones you want to visit.

search.title: Search by dish
search.description: Craving a specific dish? Enter the dish name in our search bar and find restaurants that serve exactly what you want.

details.title: Complete information
details.description: 360° virtual tours through restaurants, interactive menus, updated working hours, ambience photos... Everything you need to know about a restaurant in one place.

reservations.title: Easy reservation method
reservations.description: Reserve a table in just a few steps. Choose the date, time, and number of guests, and wait for restaurant confirmation - all within our app.

discover.title: Discover a restaurant
discover.description: Browse the experience feed, search restaurants by dish or location, or check what's new at your favorite spots.

visit.title: Visit and leave an experience
visit.description: Dine at any restaurant and snap a photo of your receipt. After we verify your visit, you'll be able to leave your authentic experience from the restaurant.

share.title: Compete and earn rewards
share.description: Collect points by scanning receipts, creating experiences, inviting friends, and climb the leaderboard to win rewards.

experiences.title: Experience Feed
experiences.subtitle: Social network for food lovers
experiences.description: Scroll through authentic user experiences at different restaurants. Like what you see in the photo? Click on the restaurant, save it, or book a table right away!

whatsNew.title: "What's New?" Posts
whatsNew.subtitle: Don't miss cool restaurant events
whatsNew.description: Restaurants post announcements like status updates - live music tonight, new dish on the menu, special offer. Filter by categories and discover what's happening nearby. Posts last up to 7 days.

faq.title: Everything you need to know about Dinver

items.question: What is Dinver?
items.answer: Dinver is an app that combines a social network with a restaurant guide. It enables guests to discover new restaurants through authentic experiences from other users and earn rewards, while allowing restaurants to showcase everything they offer in one place in an engaging way.

items.question: Is Dinver free?
items.answer: Yes! Dinver is completely free for users. Download the app, create a profile, and start exploring restaurants in your desired city.

items.question: How do I earn points and rewards?
items.answer: You earn points in several ways: by scanning receipts after restaurant visits, posting experiences with photos, and inviting friends. Every two weeks, the Top 1 user and one randomly selected user on the leaderboard win a Dinver Mystery Box with prizes!

items.question: How can I become a partner restaurant?
items.answer: Simple! Contact us through the form on our website or directly via info@dinver.eu. Our team will help you set up your profile, shoot a virtual tour, and explain all the tools we offer.

items.question: What do partner restaurants get?
items.answer: Partner restaurants get featured placement, a 360° virtual tour, an interactive menu, the ability to post "What's New?" announcements about their restaurant, and detailed analytics about visits and guests.

items.question: Is Dinver available in my city?
items.answer: We're currently focused on Croatia, with an emphasis on larger cities. If there are no available restaurants in your city, you can help us - write an experience for one of your favorite restaurants, and we'll turn it into our partner!

hero.title: About us
hero.subtitle: Dinver is a platform that connects food lovers with the best gastronomic experiences in Croatia.

story.title: Our story
paragraphs: Dinver was born from a simple idea: to make it easier for people to find their next favorite restaurant. In a world full of generic reviews and paid recommendations, we wanted to create a place where real experiences come from real people.
Our platform combines a social network with a restaurant guide, allowing users to follow friends, share their culinary moments, and discover hidden gems they wouldn't find elsewhere.
Today, Dinver brings together a community of passionate food lovers who actively explore, share, and get rewarded for every new gastronomic experience.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.subtitle: To connect every food lover with authentic gastronomic experiences and help restaurants reach the right guests.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: We believe in real experiences from real people. No fake reviews, just honest recommendations.

community.title: Community
community.description: We're building a community of food lovers who share a passion for discovering new gastronomic experiences.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We only work with restaurants that share our passion for quality and excellence.

forUsers.title: For users
items: Discover new restaurants through authentic reviews
Follow friends and see where they've dined
Earn points and rewards for every visit
Search by dish, not just by restaurant

forRestaurants.title: For restaurants
items: Increase visibility among real food lovers
Showcase your space with a 360° virtual tour
Share news and events via "What's New"
Track analytics and understand your guests

cta.title: Want to work with us?
cta.subtitle: Whether you're a restaurant looking to become a partner or have any questions, we'd love to hear from you.
